/usr/bin/c++  -lboost_thread -g  -rdynamic CMakeFiles/client.dir/src/connectionHandler.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/src/input.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/src/output.o CMakeFiles/client.dir/src/echoClient.o  -o client -lboost_system -lboost_filesystem -lboost_thread -lpthread -lboost_chrono -lboost_date_time -lboost_atomic
